0001 function lc = makelcfreq(R, zs);
0002 
0003 nclass= length(unique(zs));
0004 lc=zeros(nclass);
0005 [r, c]=ind2sub(size(R), find(R));
0006 
0007 for i = 1:length(r)
0008   lc(zs(r(i)), zs(c(i))) = lc(zs(r(i)), zs(c(i))) + R(r(i), c(i));
0009 end
